one.microstream.persistence.binary.util

Packages that use one.microstream.persistence.binary.util 
Package Description
one.microstream.cache.types  
one.microstream.persistence.binary.util  
  • Classes in one.microstream.persistence.binary.util used by one.microstream.cache.types 
    Class Description
    Serializer
    Convenient API layer to use the binary persistence functionality for a simple serializer.
    SerializerFoundation
    This type serves as a factory instance for building Serializer instances.
  • Classes in one.microstream.persistence.binary.util used by one.microstream.persistence.binary.util 
    Class Description
    ObjectCopier  
    Serializer
    Convenient API layer to use the binary persistence functionality for a simple serializer.
    SerializerFoundation
    This type serves as a factory instance for building Serializer instances.
    SerializerFoundation.Default  
    SerializerTypeInfo  
    SerializerTypeInfoStrategy
    Implementations supply the type information that is included into the serializers output.
    SerializerTypeInfoStrategy.IncrementalDiff
    This implementation includes only type information for types added to the serializers type registry in the current serialization.
    SerializerTypeInfoStrategyCreator  
    TypeDefinitionBuilder
    Create PersistenceTypeDefinitions from type strings created by the PersistenceTypeDictionaryAssembler
    TypeDefinitionImporter
    Import PersistenceTypeDefinition into the supplied PersistenceTypeHandlerManager.
    TypedSerializer
    Convenient API layer to use the binary persistence functionality for a serializer that includes type informations in the serialized data.
